stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes the value returned by the method?

features.html:
Consider the following method.

 

/** Precondition: num > 0 */
public static int mystery(int num)
{
   if (num / 10 == 0)
   { 
      return 2;
   }
   else
   {
      return 2 + mystery(num / 10);
   }
}

choicesHtml: It returns  2  more than the number of digits in  num.
It returns  2  more than the sum of the digits in  num.
It returns  2  times the number of digits in  num.
It returns  2  times the sum of the digits in  num.
